text: The 2016-17 Greek Football Cup was the 75th edition of the Greek Football Cup. Just as last year's edition, a total of 34 clubs were accepted to enter. The competition commenced on 14 September 2016 with the Preliminary Round and concluded on 6 May 2017 with the Final. The winner of the competition was PAOK for fifth time. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" ! Round !! Clubs remaining !! Clubs involved !! Winners from previous round !! New entries this round !!
